meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Hull Brad King Kristin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7024.

div.div:
Kristin Sausville game 2.
Single-player Final Jeopardy!

td.p: Stephanie Hull, a graduate student of philosophy from Columbia, Missouri
Brad King, an automotive engineer from Hartland, Michigan
Kristin Sausville, a stay-at-home mom from Newark, Delaware (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,801)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL SECRETS
TEAM OF THE WORLD SERIES MVP
BRITISH AUTHORS
COMPUTER ACTIONS
POTENT POTABLES
BOTTOMS "UP"!
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those two letters.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A stroke while fighting to get the Treaty of Versailles ratified disabled him for the last 17 months of his term')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A stroke while fighting to get the Treaty of Versailles ratified disabled him for the last 17 months of his term

tr.td: Kristin
Brad
Stephanie
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Kristin, we\'re gonna start with you. You were in third place... and in the lead.)
KristinWhat is the FDIC?
$1,600
the Social Security Administration')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'On August 15, 1994, 59 years & 1 day after FDR signed the original act, Bill Clinton made this an independent agency')

tr.td: THE U.S. GOVERNMENT
On August 15, 1994, 59 years & 1 day after FDR signed the original act, Bill Clinton made this an independent agency
Kristin
Brad
Stephanie
2-day champion: $31,601
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Kristin
Brad
Stephanie

21 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

9 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W
